Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to reporting on medical care and outcomes for incarcerated pregnant persons in the custody of the department of correction
Items.MatterName: Reporting on medical care and outcomes for incarcerated pregnant persons in the custody of the department of correction.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of a comprehensive jail population review program
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a comprehensive jail population review program.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign the Treatment Not Jail Act (S1976A/A1263A), which would amend Criminal Procedure Law Article 216 of the judicial diversion law in order to expand eligibility for treatment for court-involved individuals and shift the presumption from incarceration to community support
